My deepest sympathies on your computer, but I will warn you once more, and 
once more only.

Under NO circumstances are you to post messages of this nature WITHOUT AN 
INDICATION THAT IT IS OOC. I'm trying to be considerate, but I've already 
warned you twice. Please listen to what I'm saying.

--M.
